content:
Defender Giovanni Di Lorenzo said ‘it’s a shame’ the season was interrupted when Napoli were in a positive moment. ‘We were doing well’.
The right-back arrived at the San Paolo ahead of the current campaign and has impressed under both Carlo Ancelotti and hi… [+1725 chars]
